title: Episode 13: Brittani Coury
itunes:title: Episode 13: Brittani Coury
description: Paralympic Snowboarder Brittani Coury joins Sasha this week. Brittani shares how she finds her identity in her love of snowboarding and passion for nursing. Sasha asks her about taking time away from training to be a nurse on the frontlines of the COVID-19 pandemic. Brittani explains her journey to the Paralympics and her mission to uplift the next generation of athletes.
author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
